alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Western San Fernando Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 07 at 3:08PM PST until December 08 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST FRIDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch, north to northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and Western San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 10 AM PST Friday. For the High Wind Watch, from Friday evening through Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Western San Fernando Valley
